description:
With their classic profile and modern materials, the Step Out, stand out.

  • Designed for medium sized faces
  • Polarized lenses cut glare from water, ice, sand, snow and pavement for clear vision and reduced eye strain
  • Evolve frame material is light, tough, and 53% plant-based
  • Polycarbonate material used in the lenses is lightweight and shatter resistant
  • 4-base lens curve provides a casual wrap without being sporty
  • Microfibre cleaning/storage bag included
name: Suncloud Step Out Polarized Sunglasses - Unisex
